news.title: Confluent stock skyrockets 29% as IBM announces $11 billion acquisition deal
news.summary: IBM will pay $31 per share in cash for all of the issued and outstanding common shares of Confluent. Confluent is a leading provider of cloud-based software and services.

news.title: Berkshire Hathaway's Todd Combs, investment lieutenant to Buffett and Geico CEO, is leaving for JPMorgan
news.summary: Combs, 54, will be joining JPMorgan Chase, where he already served on the board. He will be head of the bank's new Security and Resiliency Initiative.

news.title: Ray Dalio says Middle East is becoming a 'Silicon Valley of capitalists’
news.summary: The UAE and Saudi Arabia have this year launched multibillion-dollar initiatives to build cloud, data centers and other AI infrastructure. The initiatives are expected to be worth tens of billions of dollars.

news.title: The operator of India's largest airline sees shares tumble after thousands of cancelations
news.summary: Indigo airline continues to grapple with multiple flights cancelations, leading to disruptions for passengers. Indigo airline is a subsidiary of India's state-owned Indigo Airlines.

news.title: BlackRock bets on ‘pick and shovel’ trade, singling out clear winners in AI spending spree
news.summary: Leading tech firms have only begun to tap debt markets to fund the next phase of AI expansion. Powell noted that additional capital is on the way.

news.title: Why IBM plans to buy Confluent in its biggest deal since 2019
news.summary: The tech giant announced its intent to acquire Confluent for $11 billion. It’s a play on the data required for AI.

news.title: This week’s Fed meeting will highlight the central bank’s challenge: Preventing a recession while tackling inflation
news.summary: The Fed is widely expected to cut interest rates for the third meeting in a row when it meets this week. The Fed is expected to announce a cut in interest rates at its meeting on Wednesday.

news.title: How to beat inflation over the next year in one investing move
news.summary: Short-term interest rates are too high. This sets  up an opportunity in 1-year Treasury bills. This is a good time to buy Treasury bills for the first time.

news.title: Bitcoin’s November crash was no accident
news.summary: An always-on crypto-hype machine lives to goose prices and then blame “macro” when the selloff hits.

news.title: The Fed meeting this week will determine if investors get new all-time highs or coal for Christmas
news.summary: Markets are expecting the Federal Reserve to cut interst rates at it next meeting, but some traders predict volatility. Markets expect the Fed to cut interest rates at its next meeting.
